sentences.en: Cooper, wrestling with these problems, confessed to an angry defeat.
sentences.cn: 库珀拼命想解决这些问题, 最后不得不怒冲冲地认输.

sentences.en: He could beat anybody at wrestling.
sentences.cn: 他若摔跤一定谁也摔不过他.

sentences.en: He defaulted in the wrestling tournament.
sentences.cn: 他在摔跤比赛中弃权了.

sentences.en: He enjoys going to wrestling bouts.
He is wrestling with his adversary.
He seemed to be wrestling with something.
sentences.cn: 他似乎是在斟酌什么事情.

sentences.en: He was wrestling with his sums.
sentences.cn: 他正在努力做他的算术.

sentences.en: Mrs. Wu Sun - fu looked suddenly worried, as if she was wrestling with some knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 吴少奶奶一面说, 一面她的眼神忽然散乱,似乎有什么难以解决的问题忽然抓住了她的心了.

sentences.en: She was wrestling with assignments in mathematics.
sentences.cn: 她在苦苦对付数学作业.

sentences.en: Sleep enveloped him like the swathing mirages that were wrestling with the brilliance of the lagoon.
sentences.cn: 睡意笼罩着他,就象缠绵脑际的蜃楼幻影正在同五光十色的环礁湖景致一比高低.

sentences.en: The theorists from academe, we found, were wrestling with the same concerns.
sentences.cn: 我们发现, 学院里的理论家们也正在为同样的问题而苦思冥索着.

sentences.en: There is a wrestling match tonight.
They see two men wrestling in the street.
sentences.cn: 他们看见两个男人正在街上斗殴.

sentences.en: Tu Wei - yueh was now wrestling frantically with two of the girls.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳 和两个人扭打做一团.
我们在全力应付经济衰退问题。

words.tran_cn: 与摔跤；与…搏斗；使劲搬动
摔跤；格斗（wrestle的ing形式）；与…摔跤；使劲移动

trans.tran_en: a sport in which two people fight by holding each other and trying to make each other fall to the ground

trans.tran_cn: 摔跤，试图解决，奋力对付（wrestle的现在分词）
